definitions.definition: A large river in Africa flowing through Khartoum and Cairo into the Mediterranean Sea , usually considered to be the longest river in the world.
A township in Ohio , United States , named after the river; in full, Nile Township, Scioto County, Ohio .

main_definition: A large river in Africa flowing through Khartoum and Cairo into the Mediterranean Sea , usually considered to be the longest river in the world.
secondary_definitions: A township in Ohio , United States , named after the river; in full, Nile Township, Scioto County, Ohio .
